bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: List of Roll of Honor members, by [John H. Andrus], [1938]

div1.p: Andrus lists the yellow fever volunteers with their addresses, noting which ones have died.

div1.head: List of Roll of Honor members, by [John H. Andrus], [1938]

p.hi: R O L L O F H O N O R
